page.text: Being a modern library, NTgCalls requires CMake 3.27+ to be built on your system, on Linux is required at least CLang 18+ and libx11-dev. We recommend using the latest versions of both CMake and CLang.
page.alert: Before building NTgCalls, check for pre-compiled shared libs on GitHub Releases or Python Bindings from PyPI. Building from source may be necessary if pre-compiled packages are not available.

Build Essential, libx11-dev, Clang 20 and etc:
This section provides instructions on how to install four specific packages: libx11-dev, build-essential, curl and Clang version 20. Use the following command:

multisyntax.syntax-highlight: $ sudo apt install libx11-dev build-essential curl libasound2-dev libpulse-dev libstdc++-static
$ sudo apt install libx11-dev build-essential curl libasound2-dev libpulse-dev libstdc++-static $ curl -s https://apt.llvm.org/llvm.sh | sudo bash -s -- 20
